content:
Jo Peninsulas 10:03 AM
Hi Ros,

Thank you for your response. No worries at all! If you're interested in staying informed about Earth Day 2023 and future opportunities to participate, feel free to join our LinkedIn community where we share updates and news related to the event. Additionally, we have a WhatsApp group where you can connect with others who are passionate about the cause. You can join by following this link: <https://bit.ly/Earth-Day-Community>

Wishing you the best in your job search, and we hope you'll consider joining us for Earth Day 2023 once you settle into a new role.

Take care and all the best,
Jo
